config.worn_path.title: Worn Path Configuration
config.worn_path.category.transitions.to: Configure which blocks transition into others
config.worn_path.option.step_chance.desc: 1 in N chance per step to count towards a transition. E.g. 4 means a 25% chance, 1 means every step counts.
config.worn_path.option.max_steps.descri: Number of successful steps needed to trigger a block transition.
config.worn_path.option.max_spread_depth: How far block transitions spread to neighboring blocks. 0 disables spreading.
config.worn_path.option.transitions.desc: List of block transitions in the format 'minecraft:source_block->minecraft:target_block'.
